verses.verse: And take <WH7126> <WH8685> thou unto thee Aharon <WH175> thy brother <WH251>, and his sons <WH1121> with him, from among <WH8432> the children <WH1121> of Yisra'EL <WH3478>, that he may minister unto me in the Kohen's office <WH3547> <WH8763>, even Aharon <WH175>, Nadav <WH5070> and Abihu <WH30>, Eleazar <WH499> and Ithamar <WH385>, Aharon's <WH175> sons <WH1121>.
And thou shalt make <WH6213> <WH8804> holy <WH6944> garments <WH899> for Aharon <WH175> thy brother <WH251> for glory <WH3519> and for beauty <WH8597>.

And thou shalt speak <WH1696> <WH8762> unto all that are wise <WH2450> hearted <WH3820>, whom I have filled <WH4390> <WH8765> with the spirit <WH7307> of wisdom <WH2451>, that they may make <WH6213> <WH8804> Aharon's <WH175> garments <WH899> to consecrate <WH6942> <WH8763> him, that he may minister unto me in the Kohen's office <WH3547> <WH8763>.

And these are the garments <WH899> which they shall make <WH6213> <WH8799>; a breastplate <WH2833>, and an ephod <WH646>, and a robe <WH4598>, and a broidered <WH8665> coat <WH3801>, a mitre <WH4701>, and a girdle <WH73>: and they shall make <WH6213> <WH8804> holy <WH6944> garments <WH899> for Aharon <WH175> thy brother <WH251>, and his sons <WH1121>, that he may minister unto me in the Kohen's office <WH3547> <WH8763>.
And they shall take <WH3947> <WH8799> gold <WH2091>, and blue <WH8504>, and purple <WH713>, and scarlet <WH8144> <WH8438>, and fine linen <WH8336>.

And they shall make <WH6213> <WH8804> the ephod <WH646> of gold <WH2091>, of blue <WH8504>, and of purple <WH713>, of scarlet <WH8144> <WH8438>, and fine twined <WH7806> <WH8716> linen <WH8336>, with cunning <WH2803> <WH8802> work <WH4639>.
It shall have the two <WH8147> shoulderpieces <WH3802> thereof joined <WH2266> <WH8802> at the two <WH8147> edges <WH7098> thereof; and so it shall be joined together <WH2266> <WH8795>.

And the curious girdle <WH2805> of the ephod <WH642>, which is upon it, shall be of the same, according to the work <WH4639> thereof; even of gold <WH2091>, of blue <WH8504>, and purple <WH713>, and scarlet <WH8144> <WH8438>, and fine twined <WH7806> <WH8716> linen <WH8336>.
And thou shalt take <WH3947> <WH8804> two <WH8147> onyx <WH7718> stones <WH68>, and grave <WH6605> <WH8765> on them the names <WH8034> of the children <WH1121> of Yisra'EL <WH3478>:

Six <WH8337> of their names <WH8034> on one <WH259> stone <WH68>, and the other six <WH8337> names <WH8034> of the rest <WH3498> <WH8737> on the other <WH8145> stone <WH68>, according to their birth <WH8435>.

With the work <WH4639> of an engraver <WH2796> in stone <WH68>, like the engravings <WH6603> of a signet <WH2368>, shalt thou engrave <WH6605> <WH8762> the two <WH8147> stones <WH68> with the names <WH8034> of the children <WH1121> of Yisra'EL <WH3478>: thou shalt make <WH6213> <WH8799> them to be set <WH4142> <WH8716> in ouches <WH4865> of gold <WH2091>.

And thou shalt put <WH7760> <WH8804> the two <WH8147> stones <WH68> upon the shoulders <WH3802> of the ephod <WH646> for stones <WH68> of memorial <WH2146> unto the children <WH1121> of Yisra'EL <WH3478>: and Aharon <WH175> shall bear <WH5375> <WH8804> their names <WH8034> before <WH6440> the YY <WH3068> upon his two <WH8147> shoulders <WH3802> for a memorial <WH2146>.
And thou shalt make <WH6213> <WH8804> ouches <WH4865> of gold <WH2091>;

And two <WH8147> chains <WH8333> of pure <WH2889> gold <WH2091> at the ends <WH4020>; of wreathen <WH5688> work <WH4639> shalt thou make <WH6213> <WH8799> them, and fasten <WH5414> <WH8804> the wreathen <WH5688> chains <WH8333> to the ouches <WH4865>.

And thou shalt make <WH6213> <WH8804> the breastplate <WH2833> of judgment <WH4941> with cunning <WH2803> <WH8802> work <WH4639>; after the work <WH4639> of the ephod <WH646> thou shalt make <WH6213> <WH8799> it; of gold <WH2091>, of blue <WH8504>, and of purple <WH713>, and of scarlet <WH8144> <WH8438>, and of fine twined <WH7806> <WH8716> linen <WH8336>, shalt thou make <WH6213> <WH8799> it.
Foursquare <WH7251> <WH8803> it shall be being doubled <WH3717> <WH8803>; a span <WH2239> shall be the length <WH753> thereof, and a span <WH2239> shall be the breadth <WH7341> thereof.

And thou shalt set <WH4390> <WH8765> in it settings <WH4396> of stones <WH68>, even four <WH702> rows <WH2905> of stones <WH68>: the first row <WH2905> shall be a sardius <WH124>, a topaz <WH6357>, and a carbuncle <WH1304>: this shall be the first <WH259> row <WH2905>.
And the second <WH8145> row <WH2905> shall be an emerald <WH5306>, a sapphire <WH5601>, and a diamond <WH3095>.
And the third <WH7992> row <WH2905> a ligure <WH3958>, an agate <WH7618>, and an amethyst <WH306>.
And the fourth <WH7243> row <WH2905> a beryl <WH8658>, and an onyx <WH7718>, and a jasper <WH3471>: they shall be set <WH7660> <WH8794> in gold <WH2091> in their inclosings <WH4396>.

And the stones <WH68> shall be with the names <WH8034> of the children <WH1121> of Yisra'EL <WH3478>, twelve <WH8147> <WH6240>, according to their names <WH8034>, like the engravings <WH6603> of a signet <WH2368>; every one <WH376> with his name <WH8034> shall they be according to the twelve <WH8147> <WH6240> tribes <WH7626>.
And thou shalt make <WH6213> <WH8804> upon the breastplate <WH2833> chains <WH8331> at the ends <WH1383> of wreathen <WH5688> work <WH4639> of pure <WH2889> gold <WH2091>.

And thou shalt make <WH6213> <WH8804> upon the breastplate <WH2833> two <WH8147> rings <WH2885> of gold <WH2091>, and shalt put <WH5414> <WH8804> the two <WH8147> rings <WH2885> on the two <WH8147> ends <WH7098> of the breastplate <WH2833>.
And thou shalt put <WH5414> <WH8804> the two <WH8147> wreathen <WH5688> chains of gold <WH2091> in the two <WH8147> rings <WH2885> which are on the ends <WH7098> of the breastplate <WH2833>.

And the other two <WH8147> ends <WH7098> of the two <WH8147> wreathen <WH5688> chains thou shalt fasten <WH5414> <WH8799> in the two <WH8147> ouches <WH4865>, and put <WH5414> <WH8804> them on the shoulderpieces <WH3802> of the ephod <WH646> before <WH6440> it <WH4136>.

And thou shalt make <WH6213> <WH8804> two <WH8147> rings <WH2885> of gold <WH2091>, and thou shalt put <WH7760> <WH8804> them upon the two <WH8147> ends <WH7098> of the breastplate <WH2833> in the border <WH8193> thereof, which is in the side <WH5676> of the ephod <WH646> inward <WH1004>.

And two <WH8147> other rings <WH2885> of gold <WH2091> thou shalt make <WH6213> <WH8804>, and shalt put <WH5414> <WH8804> them on the two <WH8147> sides <WH3802> of the ephod <WH646> underneath <WH4295>, toward <WH4136> the forepart <WH6440> thereof, over against <WH5980> the other coupling <WH4225> thereof, above <WH4605> the curious girdle <WH2805> of the ephod <WH646>.

And they shall bind <WH7405> <WH8799> the breastplate <WH2833> by the rings <WH2885> thereof unto the rings <WH2885> of the ephod <WH646> with a lace <WH6616> of blue <WH8504>, that it may be above the curious girdle <WH2805> of the ephod <WH646>, and that the breastplate <WH2833> be not loosed <WH2118> <WH8735> from the ephod <WH646>.

And Aharon <WH175> shall bear <WH5375> <WH8804> the names <WH8034> of the children <WH1121> of Yisra'EL <WH3478> in the breastplate <WH2833> of judgment <WH4941> upon his heart <WH3820>, when he goeth <WH935> <WH8800> in unto the holy <WH6944> place, for a memorial <WH2146> before <WH6440> the YY <WH3068> continually <WH8548>.

And thou shalt put <WH5414> <WH8804> in the breastplate <WH2833> of judgment <WH4941> the Urim <WH224> and the Thummim <WH8550>; and they shall be upon Aharon's <WH175> heart <WH3820>, when he goeth <WH935> <WH8800> in before <WH6440> the YY <WH3068>: and Aharon <WH175> shall bear <WH5375> <WH8804> the judgment <WH4941> of the children <WH1121> of Yisra'EL <WH3478> upon his heart <WH3820> before <WH6440> the YY <WH3068> continually <WH8548>.
And thou shalt make <WH6213> <WH8804> the robe <WH4598> of the ephod <WH646> all <WH3632> of blue <WH8504>.

And there shall be an hole <WH6310> in the top <WH7218> of it, in the midst <WH8432> thereof: it shall have a binding <WH8193> of woven <WH707> <WH8802> work <WH4639> round about <WH5439> the hole <WH6310> of it, as it were the hole <WH6310> of an habergeon <WH8473>, that it be not rent <WH7167> <WH8735>.

And beneath upon the hem <WH7757> of it thou shalt make <WH6213> <WH8804> pomegranates <WH7416> of blue <WH8504>, and of purple <WH713>, and of scarlet <WH8144> <WH8438>, round about <WH5439> the hem <WH7757> thereof; and bells <WH6472> of gold <WH2091> between <WH8432> them round about <WH5439>:
A golden <WH2091> bell <WH6472> and a pomegranate <WH7416>, a golden <WH2091> bell <WH6472> and a pomegranate <WH7416>, upon the hem <WH7757> of the robe <WH4598> round about <WH5439>.

And it shall be upon Aharon <WH175> to minister <WH8334> <WH8763>: and his sound <WH6963> shall be heard <WH8085> <WH8738> when he goeth <WH935> <WH8800> in unto the holy <WH6944> place before <WH6440> the YY <WH3068>, and when he cometh <WH3318> <WH8800> out, that he die <WH4191> <WH8799> not.

And thou shalt make <WH6213> <WH8804> a plate <WH6731> of pure <WH2889> gold <WH2091>, and grave <WH6605> <WH8765> upon it, like the engravings <WH6603> of a signet <WH2368>, HOLINESS <WH6944> TO THE YY <WH3068>.
And thou shalt put <WH7760> <WH8804> it on a blue <WH8504> lace <WH6616>, that it may be upon the mitre <WH4701>; upon the forefront <WH6440> <WH4136> of the mitre <WH4701> it shall be.

And it shall be upon Aharon's <WH175> forehead <WH4696>, that Aharon <WH175> may bear <WH5375> <WH8804> the iniquity <WH5771> of the holy things <WH6944>, which the children <WH1121> of Yisra'EL <WH3478> shall hallow <WH6942> <WH8686> in all their holy <WH6944> gifts <WH4979>; and it shall be always <WH8548> upon his forehead <WH4696>, that they may be accepted <WH7522> before <WH6440> the YY <WH3068>.

And thou shalt embroider <WH7660> <WH8765> the coat <WH3801> of fine linen <WH8336>, and thou shalt make <WH6213> <WH8804> the mitre <WH4701> of fine linen <WH8336>, and thou shalt make <WH6213> <WH8799> the girdle <WH73> of needlework <WH7551> <WH8802> <WH4639>.

And for Aharon's <WH175> sons <WH1121> thou shalt make <WH6213> <WH8799> coats <WH3801>, and thou shalt make <WH6213> <WH8804> for them girdles <WH73>, and bonnets <WH4021> shalt thou make <WH6213> <WH8799> for them, for glory <WH3519> and for beauty <WH8597>.

And thou shalt put <WH3847> <WH8689> them upon Aharon <WH175> thy brother <WH251>, and his sons <WH1121> with him; and shalt anoint <WH4886> <WH8804> them, and consecrate <WH4390> <WH8765> <WH3027> them, and sanctify <WH6942> <WH8765> them, that they may minister unto me in the Kohen's office <WH3547> <WH8765>.

And thou shalt make <WH6213> <WH8798> them linen <WH906> breeches <WH4370> to cover <WH3680> <WH8763> their nakedness <WH1320> <WH6172>; from the loins <WH4975> even unto the thighs <WH3409> they shall reach:

And they shall be upon Aharon <WH175>, and upon his sons <WH1121>, when they come <WH935> <WH8800> in unto the tabernacle <WH168> of the congregation <WH4150>, or when they come near <WH5066> <WH8800> unto the altar <WH4196> to minister <WH8334> <WH8763> in the holy <WH6944> place; that they bear <WH5375> <WH8799> not iniquity <WH5771>, and die <WH4191> <WH8804>: it shall be a statute <WH2708> for ever <WH5769> unto him and his seed <WH2233> after <WH310> him.
